modShortDescription: This 7DTD mod adds combiner function back to the game. This provides the ability to combine two like objects into a single better quality object.
modDescription:
This 7DTD mod adds combiner function back to the game. This provides the ability to combine two like objects into a single better quality object. The combiner is accessable via the Workbench and Vehicle Storage.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DelStryker/Delmod/tree/master/Delmod_Combiner)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11141-del-stryker-a17-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [Del Stryker](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/del-stryker/)
